title: Media Sector Supervisor
description: Supervised the media teams across five governorates, monitoring performance and conducting evaluations to ensure the quality and effectiveness of campaigns and initiatives.

title: Media Team Leader
description: Led the media team, growing it from 17 volunteers to 50.
Conducted training sessions in various media fields, enhancing team skills and contributing to the foundation's overall success in community outreach and campaigns.

title: Content Creator
description: Volunteered as a content creator, producing engaging media materials to support the foundation's campaigns and initiatives, contributing to increased awareness and community engagement.
